Quotes-name: "This time in your life is asking for your self compassion."-Morgan Love
"You could be the world's best garbage man, the world's best model; it don't matter what you do if you're the best."-Muhammad Ali
Acts: Let people know when you need a break.

Quotes-name: "It always seems impossible until it's done."-Nelson Mandela
Positive Affirmation: I let go of all that no longer serves me.
Acts: Ask for help as needed, you don't need to do this alone.

Quotes-name: "Find people who will make you better."-Michelle Obama
Acts: Be lenient with responding to others, if you decide to do so.

Quotes-name: "Let go of what has passed."-Imam Ali
Positive Affirmation: I deserve to be surrounded by people who love and respect me.

Quotes-name: "The best way to predict the future is to invent it."-Alan Kay
Positive Affirmation: My mind and my heart will remain open today.

Quotes-name: "Richness is not having many belongings, but richness is contentment of the soul."-Prophet Muhammad SAS (PBUH)
Positive Affirmation: I forgive myself for not being perfect.

Quotes-name: "I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples."–Mother Teresa
Positive Affirmation: I deserve and choose to be happy.

Quotes-name: "Every moment is a fresh beginning."-T.S. Eliot
Positive Affirmation: Every breath I inhale calms me.

Acts: Laugh and chat with a loved one.

Quotes-name: "Normality is a paved road: it’s comfortable to walk but no flowers grow."-Vincent Van Gogh
Positive Affirmation: I alone hold the truth of who I am.

Quotes-name: “To get what you love, you must first be patient with what you hate.”—Imam Al-Ghazali
Positive Affirmation: I have come farther that I would have ever thought possible, and I'm learning along the way.

Quotes-name: "I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination."-Jimmy Dean
Positive Affirmation: I invite abundance and generous hearts.

Quotes-name: "Be patient; patience is a pillar of faith."-Umar Ibn Al-Khattab
Positive Affirmation: I practice gratitude for all that I have, and all that is yet to come.

Quotes-name: "Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it."-Tori Amos
Positive Affirmation: My times of rest are productive.

Quotes-name: "Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do."-Benjamin Spock
Positive Affirmation: When I speak my needs, I receive them abundantly.

Quotes-name: "Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise."-Frank Ocean
Positive Affirmation: Today, I will hold compassion for myself.
I gently and easily return to the present moment.

Quotes-name: "Be in the company of those who boost your spirituality and motivate you to do good than those who make you feel low and unworthy."-Mufti Menk
Positive Affirmation: I am defined on my own terms.
